k=2
> sort(dis, decreasing = T)

> # clustering
> db <- dbscan(water_scale, eps=2.779840, MinPts=2)
> db
dbscan Pts=15 MinPts=2 eps=2.77984
      1 2 3
seed  5 2 8
total 5 2 8
> db$cluster
 [1] 1 1 1 1 1 2 2 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3
